Title: Windows Phone, Silverlight and WPF Multi-Touch Manipulations
Description: Windows Phone / Silverlight Behaviors and WPF samples implementing Multi-Touch Manipulation (Gestures) and Inertia.
HomeWiki:
Source Code is now maintained on GitHub https://github.com/davidezordan/multi-touch

Project Description
Windows Phone / Silverlight Behaviors and WPF samples implementing Multi-Touch Manipulation (Gestures) and Inertia.

Windows Phone and Silverlight Behaviors use code and libs from "Microsoft Surface Manipulations and Inertia Sample for Microsoft Silverlight" http://tinyurl.com/y8pzuec



Get them from NuGet: "PM> Install-Package MultiTouchBehaviors" https://nuget.org/packages/MultiTouchBehaviors/

Useful links:
  • "Having fun with Xamarin.Forms and Multi-Touch Behaviors" http://www.davidezordan.net/blog/?p=7459
  • "Xamarin.Forms: using the PanGestureRecognizer" http://www.davidezordan.net/blog/?p=7489
  • "A Silverlight / Expression Blend behavior to add Multi-Touch Manipulation and Inertia" http://www.davidezordan.net/blog/?p=1716
  • "Windows Phone 7, Multi-Touch Behaviors and the Surface samples for Silverlight" http://www.davidezordan.net/blog/?p=2033
  • "MultiTouch Behavior for Windows Phone 7" http://www.galasoft.ch/Touch/
  • "MultiTouch Behavior for Windows Phone 7: Videos" http://is.gd/di1no
  • "Touch-based Gestures API in XNA Game Studio 4.0" http://creators.xna.com/en-us/sample/gestures
  • "Enabling Multi-touch gestures in WPF using Expression Blend 4 RC and the TranslateZoomRotate behavior" http://www.davidezordan.net/blog/?p=1938
  • "Introduction to WPF 4 multi-touch" by Jaime Rodriguez http://tinyurl.com/ygpjrcg
  • "Basic Manipulation Event Handling in Windows Phone 7" by Charles Petzold http://www.charlespetzold.com/blog/2010/06/Basic-Manipulation-Event-Handling-in-Windows-Phone-7.html
